turns.content: Can you make a pricing list example that will cost someone $1200, within this list would be: audiovisual package, visual package, audio package, 4 revisions, 20-30 minute video

Sure, here's an example pricing list that would cost $1,200:

* Audiovisual Package: $800
	+ Includes: Visual Package and Audio Package
* Visual Package: $400 (included in Audiovisual Package)
	+ Includes: 4 revisions
* Audio Package: $400 (included in Audiovisual Package)
* 4 revisions: $0 (included in Visual Package)
* 20-30 minute video: $0 (included in Audiovisual Package)

Total: $1,200
can you add that additional revisions will cost extra money and can you take the audiovisual package and change the word package into portions

Sure, here's the updated pricing list:

* Audiovisual Portions: $800
	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
* Visual Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
	+ Includes: 4 revisions
* Audio Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
* Additional revisions: $100 each

Total: $1,200 (for 4 revisions)

Note: Additional revisions beyond the 4 included in the Visual Portion will incur additional costs.
can we also add that being in person and other formats will incur additional as well

Sure, here's the updated pricing list with the additional information:

* Audiovisual Portions: $800
	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
* Visual Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
	+ Includes: 4 revisions
* Audio Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
* Additional revisions: $100 each
* In-person filming: $200 (additional fee)
* Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): $200 (additional fee)

Total: $1,200 (for 4 revisions and standard format)

Note: Additional services such as in-person filming and other formats will incur additional costs.
can we change the word revision to meetings and change that from 4 to 3 and also take out in person filming

Sure, here's the updated pricing list with the changes you've requested:

* Audiovisual Portions: $800
	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
* Visual Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
	+ Includes: 3 meetings
* Audio Portion: $400 (included in Audiovisual Portions)
* Additional meetings: $100 each
* Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): $200 (additional fee)

Total: $1,200 (for 3 meetings and standard format)

Note: Additional services such as other formats will incur additional costs.

For this line : Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): $200 (additional fee)
can we change : $200 to Additional services such as other formats will incur additional costs.

 Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video

	+ Includes: Visual Portion and Audio Portion, and a 20-30 minute video
	+ Includes: 3 meetings and revisions

Audiovisual Portions: $1050
Includes: 30 minute video where there is custom audio and video
Includes: 3 meetings and revisions ( note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.

As discuss there is artistic freedom within the following parameters:
- minimalistic nature that includes geometric shapes ( triangles, squares, etc)
-colors mainly to be used are red and gray
- sound details hasn't been materialized or mentioned yet and examples should be given before the meetings or revision costs would be charged

Payments would be done in Late March and April

Sure, here's the updated pricing list with the changes you've requested:

* Audiovisual Portions: $1050
	+ Includes: 30 minute video with custom audio and video
	+ Includes: 3 meetings and revisions (note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
	+ Artistic freedom within the following parameters:
		- Minimalistic nature that includes geometric shapes (triangles, squares, etc.)
		- Colors mainly to be used are red and gray
		- Sound details have not been materialized or mentioned yet and examples should be given before the meetings or revision costs are charged
* Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.

Payments to be made in late March and April.

Total: $1,050 (for 3 meetings, standard format, and artistic freedom within the given parameters)
can we add to Minimalistic line : Minimalistic and Slow movements

Sure, here's the updated pricing list with the change you've requested:

* Audiovisual Portions: $1050
	+ Includes: 30 minute video with custom audio and video
	+ Includes: 3 meetings and revisions (note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
	+ Artistic freedom within the following parameters:
		- Minimalistic nature with slow movements that includes geometric shapes (triangles, squares, etc.)

Audiovisual Portions: $1050
Includes: 30 minute video with custom audio and video
Includes: 3 meetings and revisions (note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
For this purpose . A Meeting define as a schedule time, discussing about the project:

the first meeting will be about the sound and the inspirations that you want to fuel those unless there is some thoughts that arrived prior

the second meeting will be about the flow of the video and place
things to note about the video :
is there a possibility of sustaining a theme throughout or is it a merely looping with enough change to be a video?
Artistic freedom within the following parameters:
Minimalistic nature with slow movements that includes geometric shapes (triangles, squares, etc.)
Colors mainly to be used are red and gray
Sound details have not been materialized or mentioned yet and examples should be given before the meetings or revision costs are charged ( preference has been discuss about relating to health)
Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.
Payments to be made in late March and April.

Total: $1,050 (for 3 meetings, standard format, and artistic freedom within the given parameters)

Yes, here's the updated pricing list with the changes you've requested:

* Audiovisual Portions: $1050
	+ Includes: 30 minute video with custom audio and video
	+ Includes: 3 meetings and revisions (note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
	+ Meetings defined as scheduled times to discuss the project:
		- First meeting: Discuss sound and inspirations, unless thoughts have already been arrived prior
		- Second meeting: Discuss flow of the video and placement
		- Note: Consideration of sustaining a theme throughout the video or just looping with enough change to be a video
	+ Artistic freedom within the following parameters:
		- Minimalistic nature with slow movements that includes geometric shapes (triangles, squares, etc.)
		- Colors mainly to be used are red and gray
		- Sound details have not been materialized or mentioned yet and examples should be given before the meetings or revision costs are charged (preference is for sounds related to health)
* Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.

Payments to be made in late March and April.

Total: $1,050 (for 3 meetings, standard format, and artistic freedom within the given parameters)
